entry.title: Purchase requisition creation currency error
entry.content:
Dear Friends,

When the User is trying to create Purchase requisition, User is getting the error "Enter Rate INR/PHP rate type M for 19.08.2025 in the system settings".

However the company code currency PHP and Vendor currency is PHP. How come INR is being displayed?

In the table TCURR, PHP to EUR.  There is no INR.

Please suggest.

Regards

Sridhar

entry.title: SAP VENDOR MASTER UPLOADER.
entry.content:
Hi all,

I want to create SAP VENDOR MASTER uploader by calling BAPI, I did

Please help here!

entry.title: S4 brownfield migration, having ABST2 differences in 2nd & 3rd currency
entry.content:
Hello All,

We are in S4 migration process & executed ABST2 in our source ECC system, balances between FI-AA matching in first local currency, but there are huge differences in second & third currency.

Is it fine if we migrate with this differences or is it going to have any negative impact post migration, if we need to correct what is the way for same - It seems these differences accumulated over the years in ECC.

Please guide on this, any help will be greatly appreciated.

Regards,

Sumesh Gupta

So we need to change it, in order that validation will be: fiscal year instead of date.

Please suggest.

Regards

Sridhar

entry.title: Payment Block not working in FB60 even though Manual payments block is checked
entry.content:
We have a payment block of X, and manual payments + change in pmnt prop. are checked

On the vendor master the payment block is set to "X"

But when we use FB60 we get a warning that the account has a payment block yet we can still post it and no payment blocks show.  I thought the manual payments block check would stop this, am I wrong?

entry.title: Hard currency values as realtime posting in asset depreciation area - Turkey POC
entry.content:
Dear sir/madam,

We have added hard currency as parallel currency for ledger postings

Local currency/Company code currency- USD

Global currency - USD

Hard Currency - TRY

we have created new chart of depreciation and created multiple depreciation areas for different ledger postings.

0L - Leading ledger

L1- Local ledger

T1- Tax ledger

For L1 ledger for asset postings, we want to have hard currency values as real time posting

So for ledger L1, we need system to take Hard currency valuess to be posted to GL instead of deriving from company code currency. is there any affect to other ledgers if we make hard currency values as real time posting. Please let us know.

 

Thanks

entry.title: Vendor Master Customization(Implementation).
entry.content:
Hi All,

I got a requirement from Business user, They want when End user fill data manually in BP to make Vendor Code, Normal when we save they provide me Vendor Code. But their requirement is User when save SAP not provide them Vendor Code , Only allow to save the DATA. After the finance approval only after approval or When Finance approve it by Approval Button only then they get the Vendor Code automatically on the End user Mail id.

My idea  is, We can make Custom T-CODE with the help of ABAP just like BP, And custom tables to store data.

I want to know the feasibility, Idea and solution for the requirement.

Please help me here.

entry.title: Need API to Trigger Outbound Payment Status After Bank Rec (IHC Scenario)
entry.content:
Hello Community,

We are working on a scenario in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud 2508 and need guidance on the best approach for an integration.

Scenario Overview:

We have implemented Inhouse Cash (IHC) with Payment Orders.

Supplier Invoices are created and tagged in a third-party system.

These invoices are successfully sent to and processed within S/4HANA.

The payment process runs in S4, and bank statements are posted using in S4 viaBANK_STATEMENT_POST_IN API to perform reconciliation.

Our Requirement:
Immediately after the bank statement is posted and invoices are reconciled (marked as paid in S4), we need to send the payment status (e.g., "Cleared" or "Paid") back to the third-party system via a pre-built interface.

We’ve Researched and aware that BusinessPartnerPaymentStatus OData API to read the status, but we need a trigger to push the data. We have explored Outbound Services (SOAP) but are unsure which one is raised post-bank reconciliation.

My Question:
What is the recommended API or Event we can leverage to trigger our logic after a successful BANK_STATEMENT_POST_IN. Our goal is to identify all invoices paid during that reconciliation run and push their status out to third party system.

We would greatly appreciate if you share your expertise :

The specific Business Event or Outbound Service that is triggered by a bank statement posting/reconciliation.

If a direct API is not available, what is the recommended extension strategy (e.g., a side-by-side extension listening to an event) to achieve this in the public cloud?

Thank you in advance for your time and expertise.

Regards,

Mahavir

entry.title: RERAPP Save Variant issue
entry.content:
Hello,
We had some issues with RERAPP today where a saved variant was pulling different information in on one person"s computer which was different from the details which were saved on the other users computer. Specifically, a random contract number previously entered in contract field of RERAPP was being pulled into the variant when it was ran by the 2nd employee.

We don"t understand why RERAPP pulling previously run contract information as default when we try to execute it with variant. Please advise.

Thanks,

 

Jayant Patel

entry.content:

Now we need  to change the domain of these emails. Example: someone1@sender1.com to someone2@sender2.com

How can I carry out this maintenance?

Best regards,

entry.title: Duplication in Define Number Ranges (ID:102296)
entry.content:
Hello everyone,

I'm currently setting up BP number ranges and am unable to register them due to an overlap between the two ranges below. Can you help me understand what might be causing this duplication?

① 90010000 to 99999999
② 90000000 to 9000ZZZZ

Configuration Activity ID   :  102296
Central Business Configuration path  :  General Business Data > Business Partners > Business Partner Master Data > Basic settings for Business Partners > Define Number Ranges

Thank you for your help.

entry.title: Fiscal Year and Posting Period
entry.content:
Suppose I am starting a company in mid of a month (suppose 15th April), for this can I restrict the user to not able to select any date before the 15th of April, since before that my organisation was not in existence. 
But whenever I am creating a fiscal year and posting period, I am making the full month open and not a part of it which is on the basis of date. So, is there any way to manage this scenario.

entry.title: deselect “delivery cost" in app create supplier invoice
entry.content: When I create an invoice via app: create supplier invoice, in the settings of "assignment options, as default, it will choose delivery costs. Can it be deselected as the default?

entry.title: Case Study: Gift card given to suppliers to be reflected on 1099 NEC
entry.content:
The business wants to ensure that the value of all gift cards given to suppliers is properly reflected on Form 1099-NEC.

As is the process: Gift card is handled in a spreadsheet, and 1099 is  adjusted manually 

Now: We have implemented S4HANA 2022 and are using the App " run statutory reports" in Fiori ( Basic statutory report)

How do we record them? Since gift cards are cash equivalents and compensatory in nature, their value must be tracked as non-employee compensation.  Thanks for your help.
